section.name: WOLips
section.p: wizards popup manipulating the build process bugs and known issues inside WOLips

section.name: Manipulating the Build Process
section.p: If you add a file named WOLipsBuild.properties in your project root you can manipulate the build process.
A later version should have a preferences dialog for that.
destdir -> Where to install your framework c:/foo/bar default ../../framework-export
